item.description:
Hi Everyone!

The votes are in, and this month's book is The Hour I First Believed, by Wally Lamb. Kepp in mind that if you are purchasing this book I believe you can get a 15% discount at Brookline Booksmith by telling them you are in a book club. I have added meetup's automated waiting list but I have not used it before so we will see how well it works. Feel free to email me with any questions. I have modified the message board so it is more like a forum now and you can feel free to post thoughts there as well.

Hope to see you there!
Cheryl
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a sign up.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: February Meetup: The Hour I First Believed by Wally Lamb
